ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Character Names and Servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. I ve had people think that it was the same person controlling my alt and my brother s alt. It s really fun when my bro, mom, and sis all get in a group
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. I've had people think that it was the same person controlling my alt
and my brother's alt. It's really fun when my bro, mom, and sis all get in a
group with me. But it's very rare.
luv,
-Su

> Lesamlam Eatenham
> 50 Enchanter
>
> Laealena Eatenham
> 38 Monk
>
> Torvonnilous server
>
> I roleplay Laealena as Lesamlam's younger sister.
>
> > Now that everyone has come out of the woodwork to help the newbie, Why
> > don't we all share our char's names and particulars and what servers
> > we play on?
> >
> > I would really love to hear from everyone else on the list.
> >
> > Bebinn Maolcataig
> > 21 Ranger Woodelf of Tunare
> >
> > Kaba
> > 11 Beastlord Vah Shir
> >
> > Lindir
> > 7 Bard Vah Shir
> >
> > On Bristlebane Server
> >
>
>
